name: Voyager
overview: Voyager is a fast paced, intermediate Kaizo hack with some puzzle elements and a light narrative. It is overall mostly vanilla but includes some chocolate mechanics. It aims to be somewhat of a challenge for all Kaizo skillsets (beginners be warned), but overall it aims to be fun. It includes brand new custom graphics, but I tried to keep them as similar to the original SMW style as possible. There is a light story to add some theming and atmosphere, but its not a major focus, just there for people who enjoy that sort of thing. Also includes: - 8 secret portrait rooms - Custom Music - Music-free file - Checkpoint saves - Fast Retry - Standard quality of life patches What to expect: - Modern, fast paced gameplay - A balance of standard platforming and tricks - Some puzzly set-ups - No Kaizo blocks - No bosses - Semi open world - Trolls - Music that compliments the atmosphere of the level rather than non-stop "bangers" (sorry) Thanks for playing, good luck, and ENJOY!
